attributes.action: end mainland Turkey's presence in Cyprus
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge the British government to request for the removal of Turkish TROOPS from the island of Cyprus. (This petition makes no reference to the issue of settlers as is already stated in other E-Petitions). The "Turkish Troops" defined as nationals of mainland Turkey that have either been conscripted for national service puproses or are career staff in the Turkish military.
